text: Ngayon at Kailanman () is a 2018 Philippine drama television series. Directed by Mae Cruz-Alviar and Elfren Parpan Vibar, the series stars Julia Barretto and Joshua Garcia, together with an ensemble cast consisting of Jameson Blake, Iza Calzado, Alice Dixson, Rosemarie Gil, Rio Locsin, Ina Raymundo, Dominic Ochoa, and Christian Vasquez. The series premiered on ABS-CBN's Primetime Bida evening block and worldwide on The Filipino Channel on August 20, 2018, replacing Bagani. ==Series overview== ==Episodes== ===Season 1 (2018–19)=== ==References== Ngayon
